title:
What is the story behind the NC Motor Vehicle License Plate Agency on the cornor of Market and Kerr?  Must we be subjected to the rudeness of the people that work in that office.  The only information I\'ve been able to get is that it\'s privately owned.  If it is a state office (?) then how can it be privately owned?  I\'ve written to Raleigh but hope you\'re faster.  My sincere thanks.



Mary Deal
text:
Some N.C. DMV license plate renewal offices are operated by private
contractors.



There's another office at 2390 Carolina Beach Road Suite 108.



N.C. DMV's Customer Service Office number is 919-715-7000.
